underlying_goal: Check if claude/hooks are version-controlled and then update documentation about deployment defaults.
primary_success: Proactively identified that the documentation for deployment defaults was out of sync with the actual configuration script, and then updated the docs to be accurate.
brief_summary: The user asked about version control for hooks and deployment defaults. Claude confirmed the hooks were tracked and then proactively found and fixed outdated documentation regarding default deployment flags, committing the fix.
